1.0.name: wordpress/inquiry-form-to-posts-or-pages
1.0.description:
This Simple Plugin will add an Inquiry form for a Post or page. Site Administrator will be allowed to customize this inquiry form as he/she wants to show it to site visitors. The plugin will support both short code and php code for adding the inquiry form in to your wordpress site.

short code - [inquiry_form] php code - [?php if (function_exists('inquiry_form')) echo inquiry_form();?]

author's website : http://www.mclanka.com/
